LocaleResource.Name: AdminInstruction
LocaleResource.Value:
This is how you set up your Twitter login:

  • Create a developer account and a Twitter application.
  • In the application settings under Settings > Callback URLs, enter the Callback URLs listed below. Also enter a Privacy Policy URL and a Terms of Service URL.
  • Activate the option Request email addresses from users under Permissions > Additional Permissions.
  • After creating the application you find the Consumer Key and the Consumer Secret under Keys and Access Tokens. Please insert them into the corresponding fields further down on this page.

LocaleResource.Name: CallbackUrls.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The Callback URLs to be entered at Twitter.
